'''''"Press the Self-Destruct Button!"''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must use {{Pyro}} attacks to defeat the [[Lava Dragon Statue]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* Use {{Pyro}} attacks to fill the boss's [[Fury]] bar until it transforms into its Molten Dragon form, then fill its second Fury bar to overwhelm and defeat it.
* Avoid using {{Hydro}} or {{Cryo}} attacks. When the boss is in its base form, these attacks will not fill its Fury bar, and after it transforms, they will actually deplete its Fury bar.
